Battle High School religion and English teacher Greg Soden spends hours each week listening to podcasts. With his headphones on in the grocery store, Soden plans meals for his family while learning about religion or current events or punk rock music. When he isn’t listening to a podcast, he’s producing one. In August, Soden created the Classical Ideas Podcast, where he converses with religious authorities, philosophers and scholars.
